pages.text: 26|61|haey nowpel del krom teangpir bankheunh knea  krom mousaea  ban niyeay tha  puok yeung pitchea trauv ke tamtan haey .
26|62|ke( mou sa) ban pol tha  te.  puokke poum ach tamtan te .  pitabrakd nasa  mcheasa robsakhnhom sthetnow cheamuoy khnhom  trong nung bangheanhophlauv  dl khnhom .

26|63|pelnoh yeung ban phdal vea hi towkean mou sa tha  chaur anak  veay tukasamoutr nung dambng robsa anak choh.  rompechnoh tukasamoutr  kaban nhek chenhpi knea( chea dbpir phlauv)  haey real  bamnek tuk ( del nhek chenhpi knea) noh brieb dauchchea phnom da thom .
26|64|haey yeung ban thveu aoy krom dtei( hvie r aon  ning krom  robsa ke) kante tow chit tinoh( rhaut tealte puokke chaul tow knong  tukasamoutr) .
26|65|kraoyomk yeung ban sangkroh mousaea  ning anak del nowchea  muoy ke teangoasaknea  .
26|66|banteabmk yeung ban ponlich krom dteitiet( hvie r aon ning  krom robsa ke) .
26|67|pitabrakd nasa  nowknong pru tde kar noh  kuchea phosdo tang  muoy da chbasaleasa .  te puokke pheakochraen kmean chomnue laey .
26|68|haey pitabrakd nasa  mcheasa robsa anak kuchea mcheasa mha khlangpouke  mha anet sraleanh .
26|69|haey chaur anak( mou ham meat) sautr pi damnaerrueng robsa  ai pr hi m aoy puokke( puok kmean chomnue) sdab choh .
26|70|khn del keat( ai pr hi m) ban suor towkean aupouk robsa keat  ning krom robsa keat tha  tae avei tow del puok anak kampoung korp  sakkar noh
26|71|puokke ban chhlaey tha  yeung kampoungte korp sakkar champoh  roubsaamnak teangoasa nih  haey yeung nung b nd karkorp tow champoh  puokke chea rieng rhaut .
26|72|keat( ai pr hi m) ban suor tha  tae puokvea( roubsaamnak)lyy  puok anak nowpel del puok anak buongsuong som der ryyte
26|73|ryy muoy puokvea ach phdal phalobrayoch  ryy phdal krohthnak  dl puok anak der ryyte
26|74|puokke ban chhlaey tha phtoytowvinh  puok yi ng bankheunh chidaun  chitea robsa puok yeung thveu dau che  neah  .
26|75|keat( ai pr hi m) ban pol tha  tae puok anak bankheunh nouv  avei del puok anak kampoungte korp sakkar ryyte
26|76|puok anak  ning chidaunchitea robsa puok anak tangpi borankal mk  noh
26|77|haey pitabrakd nasa  puokvea( roubsaamnak) kuchea satrauv robsakhnhom  leuklengte mcheasa krobkrong piphp teangoasa bonnaoh .
26|78|del trong chea anak bangkeut khnhom  ning chea anak changaoulobangheanh dl khnhom ( nouv meakra da troemotrauv) .
26|79|haey trong kuchea anak del phdal chamneiahar dl khnhom  ning phdal  tuk dl khnhom .
26|80|haey nowpel khnhom mean chomngu  ku trong chea anak del thveu aoy khnhom chea saah  sbaey .
26|81|haey trong chea anak del thveu aoy khnhom slab  banteabmk trong thveu aoy  khnhom rsa laengvinh .
26|82|haey trong kuchea anak del khnhom sangkhum yeang chbasa tha trong  nung aphytosa aoy khnhom nouv real kamhosachhkang robsakhnhom now thngai choum nom chomreah(thngai  barlok) .
26|83|ao mcheasa robsakhnhom.  saum trong me tda bratan dl khnhom nouv pheap chhleasavei  ning banhchoul khnhom tow knongchamnaom anak del sang ampeula troem  trauv phng choh .
